title: HPC in Region Panel
segmentation: Hello again, good afternoon.
My name is Andrew Lippa Inconic from Turbo Institute from Ljubljana from Slovenia.
I will present our activities of using high performance computing in hydropower development, so this presentation will be.
A little different that all others becausw I will not talking a lot about cloud computing, but mainly of using really super computers for a real industrial.
Apllication, so maybe just a few words, about two Institute through Institute was established 1948.
So almost 65 years ago.
That time is real Institute for the whole ex Yugoslav industry of hydraulic machinery.
Now we are private company privatized in the middle of 90s.
And now we are on the market 100%.
And but still one of our basic product is development and research work for huge or for big producers of hydraulic machines for producers of equipment for hydropower plants so.
And we are using.
Maybe from 25 years ago.
Computational fluid dynamics.
This is one of the area of the of the research area where you need really powerful computers, but at that time when I start it, internal Institute was 28 years ago.
It was not possible to have powerful computer and it was not possible to have the software for this.
So we started with our own development.
With develop we developed our own software.
But then we have decided that our group was too small to really make a good software and we started to use commercial software at the beginning of 90s or maybe at the end of 80s.
And of course, we also used supercomputer already 20 years ago because in Slovenia at that time we had one supercomputer convex.
I think that first convex was 220 and beside Institute user Stephanie Ljubljana and National Chemistry Institute also Turbo Institute used this.
This computer at that time and so from beginning of 90s.
Up to now, we are deeply involved in computational fluid dynamics.
So what is the basic idea of fluid dynamics just to solve?
This system of equations as you see here may be OK. You can say it's very simple system of equations and well known system and very old more than 150 years.
But we still have a lot of problems with solving these systems 'cause we don't have any analytical solution for our applications.
We can just find.
Numerical solution and for an American solution, we know that this is just approximate, so we have good or bad approximations.
So always we have some error.
And of course we.
Would like to minimize this error.
If we go to history, we can see the way of research work in the fluid flow.
This was almost 500 years ago.
Maybe we can say also, this was cloud computing just sitting and looking on the River and maybe make some sketch and OK this was the maybe the 1st first research work then Interbau Institute.
We worked a lot on the experimental work, so we have a huge laboratory for testing all different types of water turbines and pumps so we can make a lot of a lot of measurements.
A lot of experiments, but nowadays this.
Can be a problem cause if you want to be competitive in the global market, the development process should be as short as possible.

So if you can see here the production time of 1 model is one month of even more, and of course we can replace this real physical model with computational model and if we have computational model and if this can be done in one or two days, it's much much faster.
But for solving the flow.
Insight of this complete computational domain.
We usually need quite powerful computer.
If you would like to obtain.
Good results for Acura.
Enough results becausw.
What is the main issue in our business?

Accuracy and time so we have to obtain very fast results and of course accuracy is important so we usually we have to make a compromise between accuracy and time because some calculations can run even some months and this is this is too long for real industrial industrial project.
So that's why we.
Decided to buy our own supercomputer.
This was four years ago 2008, as you see here.
This is our computer which we used at the moment with 2048 cores.
We have 512 quad core processors with four terabytes of RAM.
Alot of hard disk and InfiniBand for parallel computing and so on.
So now this is the software we use but.
The software or hardware the hardware is usually not enough 'cause you need.
You need a good software which can run on such system.
And of course before we started to use these computers we usually we had problems with the curacy which the efficiency of the water turbines and so on.
But when we started to use such massive parallel computer we.
Obtain a new problems.
For instance, scalability parallel computing is now a big problem, cause it's not possible to run on complete 2000 cores and to obtain so much, much faster results becausw.
Usually we can, we can obtain linear speedup maybe up to 250 cores, something like this with the software which we use.
Now we have at the moment two different commercial software.
One is ANSYS CFX and another is numerica software from Belgium and both softwares.
Or not.

Perfect in this speed up when we would like to use really huge number of of course, but usually this is not so big problem becausw in the development process of water turbine or pump or any other machine we do we usually have a lot of geometry's, a lot of operating points so we can run parallel alot of jobs so it's not necessary to run just one job on the whole.
Number of of the processors.
So and now I would like to show you some.
Some examples.
1st is the complete analysis of 1 Francis turbine.
Usually we use steady state numerical analysis because steady state is very fast and we don't need to calculate lot of time steps.
But if we have any special unsteady phenomena like here you can see this vertex rope inside inside the draft tube.
Then we need to run unsteady calculation and usually for for instance for one to two seconds of the real situation of the real flow inside the turbine.
We need a million times.
CPU time, so for one second real time we need at least 1,000,000 seconds of the computation.
Depends on the number of processors, but this is this is maybe one average solution, but this is not.
It's not always always the same.
The same situation.
So if you would like to obtain the numerical results in real time, we will need at the moment 1 million times faster computer.
So maybe in the near future we will get also also such such computers.
So another, maybe even more complicated flow is Pelton turbine, like you see here.
This was also done in Interbau Institute for this few seconds of the flow.
We use special numerical methods, finite volume methods, and the computational domain should be divided on maybe 50 million of elements, and on each element.
Then you solve this equations as I mentioned before.

And of course, this is unsteady flow free surface flow, two phase flow, and it's it's quite complicated and also for such calculation for one operating point you need usually maybe one month or even more than one month.
So this is still a huge problem if you would like to really make a development process very fast.
This this is this is a real obstacle in in.
Even that we have quite powerful computer for for our company, I think for the medium size of the enterprise this computer is really good.
So maybe in the future.
If we connect it now, this high performance computing and and cloud computing for some special cases we will need, maybe I don't know.
More course if of course the scalability for speed up will be linear up to maybe 10,000 cores in the future, then such calculation can be done can be done much much faster.
OK, so with the software and the hardware which we have is also possible to run.
Different other applications, like maybe the moving the ship and also we may.
Some other applications, maybe this is 1 special case of wind.

Analysis around the thermal power plant in Slovenia will build now knew a new thermal power plant in short and and the cooling tower is more than 160 meters, height and of course for civil engineers is very important to obtain the real data of all influence of the wind from all all directions.
And of course of course all different different.
Speed of the wind.
So we made these calculations.
So we modeled 3D domain of the complete environment around around the the thermal power plant and all buildings which are important in this.
In these calculations.
Of course we use this.
For instance, for nuclear power plant this is 1 example of cooling.
Cooling water pumps in the nuclear power plants.
So this water here comes from the River from the Server River.
And then here we have three vertical intakes and of course in if you see the streamlines here are not very nice, so we can have sometimes some problems and we obtain some damages.
On the pumps and so on.
And we would like to optimize this flow inside inside this computational domain and of course.
If you.
Would like to make any other application is also possible?
These are just just a few examples where CFD, so computational fluid dynamics is very important, especially.
Aeronautic industry also car industry also.
Also winter around buildings and so on.
So in many many different many different applications can be can be used with this with this software.
So.
At the end, what is the basic idea in industry?

Now we would like to replace a lot of physical models, a lot of experimental work with virtual prototyping, so we would like to obtain all characteristics before any part of the model of prototype is really really.
Produced so for all these phases we need computers and of course we have.
We need first computers we need we need software and at the moment we know that especially for this.
This phase here for simulation phase for computational fluid dynamics or solid mechanics, or aeroacoustic electromagnetics.
OK, these are not our area of work, but it still is possible to use.
We know that we still need to get better software, improved software to obtain more accurate results, also faster results.
And of course if we will achieve all this of all these goals which we.
We want to achieve then maybe everything this can be used also in the in the clouds becausw what is now the main problem in look maybe here in Slovenia or maybe in in countries around Slovenia.
WHI the CFD is not so widely spread used in the industry because usually in companies they don't know how big computer.
They need how much of the software they need or they need just one license so they need 10 licenses or they need.
I don't know hundred parallel processors or just one and so on and maybe with the if all these service can be in the in the.
Cloud then this decision can be done much much easier.
So our goal is also to make some improvement of the software which is used now for hydraulic machinery.
We would like to improve preprocessing, maybe in post processing because usually this software is not so user friendly.
And of course if this is not so user friendly the people are also afraid to use to use such software so.
Usually this can be done much more user friendly, but of course the software vendors they make a software which is very common which can be used for all different applications.
But our idea is to improve, for instance this part of hydraulic machinery.
So how to make automatic geometry parameterization of geometry automatic regeneration so?
All all phases of processing and also post processing.
Then when you obtain a huge amount of the results, this is also one of one of the problems in our case here 'cause.
In case of, for instance Pelton turbine, you can get for one operating points, for instance 1, two or three terabytes of the of the results.
And of course it's very difficult then to analyze all these results or even we have problem with the storage Bill Cosby cause after after a few operating points.
After a few different geometry's we have really a lot a lot of lot of results.
So.
This was from my site.
From the industry point of view of using high performance computing and maybe also in the future cloud computing in this in this area.
So thank you for your attention.
